quotes: I am a euphoric quote maker.
Some cultural practices need to be stamped out.
I have the least self control of anyone I know.
Manifest destiny is a great idea.
Almost anything I say is bad.
I get nostalgic about the colonisation of Quebec.
Nobody loves the guys more than me.
If you died I wouldn't shed one tear, because I'd be too busy shedding the blood of my enemies! I'd be the oppressor!
One could argue that when dialogue fails, violence is sometimes the solution.
Education is the key to advancement.
